metadata.title: CVE-2020-7009 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Elasticsearch versions from 6.7.0 before 6.8.8 and 7.0.0 before 7.6.2contain a privilege escalation flaw if an attacker is able to create APIkeys. An attacker who is able to generate an API key can perform a seriesof steps that result in an API key being generated with elevatedprivileges.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
